metadata.title: CVE-2023-45863 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in lib/kobject.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.3.With root access, an attacker can trigger a race condition that results ina fill_kobj_path out-of-bounds write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-lowlatency - 5.4.0-171.189
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-75-generic - 5.15.0-75.82~20.04.1
